attributes.action: dont discriminate retirement age for women in their 50s
attributes.additional_details: why do women have to work much longer.when mps can retire on fat pensions.We should have a choice. What happens if a women or a man having to work longer. cant work until retirement age. Also if some one has paid stamps all their life, and is now in a low paid job.they would be entitled to no help if they could no longer do the job Give the jobs to youngsters. what you pay them on JSA you could pay the mere pittance of a pension to an older person. Its rubbish we living longer. with fuel going up we will be dying younger
